title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.230 - Repair
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.230 - Repair

State Regulations
(a) The restoration
of a capital asset to its full productive capacity, or a contribution thereto, after damage, accident or prolonged use, without increase in its previously
estimated service life or productive capacity. (b) The charge to operations representing the
cost of such restoration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.230

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
